page.title: 11The Lunds:It's a dog's life!
page.content: Les & June Lund run Qualco kennels on the corner of Flax Lane\Hobcross Lane. Originally a pub,"Scutcher's Arms",the kennels have operated since 1970.The Lund's find that holiday times are particularly busy for them eg. Xmas,New Year,Easter and the summer months. However,many leave their pets for long weekends whilst they take a break. Les & June breed a variety of dogs inc. Bulldogs,Miniature & Giant Schnauzers, Airedale Terriers,Great Danes & Pekingese.They have exported dogs all over the world and have champions in USA,Italy,France,Australia & UK. When asked about the problems running a kennels they said being woken in the middle of the night by owners returning from holiday was the worst!They also confirmed the notion that where there is a grumpy dog you can be sure to find a grumpy owner!
